name: IITAN by 111%
description:
= BBTAN + Pinball
Swipe your finger to break all bricks!
Don’t drop the ball in blackhole!
You can load upto 5 balls. Pick the best.

The keypoint is ‘ANGLE’.
How long can you go?

IITAN by 111%

More Features
◆ Enjoy creative pin-ball stages.
◆ Free Offline Game Play
◆ Collect 24 ball designs & effects
◆ Upgrade balls, Strong damage
◆ Random balls in GACHA!
◆ Special maps every 5 stages
◆ Subscribe 111% YouTube to get hidden
◆ Using physical game engine.

Share your screenshots online such as Facebook or Instagram.
Enjoy IITAN while you in school, on a date, in the bus or subway, waiting at the food line and so on. Anytime, anywhere you can play IITNA!!

“IITAN is Simple, but Addictive."
